name: Two-Way Replies
description: SMS reply handling for crew responses like 'Out today' with automatic reassignment prompts.

prd.problemStatement: Crew availability changes require quick adjustments. Two-way SMS allows crew to communicate status changes, triggering reassignment workflows.
userStories: As a crew member, I want to reply 'Out today' so that my superintendent knows I'm unavailable
As a superintendent, I want reassignment prompts so that I can quickly adjust schedules
